channel.description: Recent content in Software Development on Kevin Foster

item.title: Tribal Tests: How Harsh Environments Expose a Lack of Wisdom
item.description: When we romanticize tribal life, we imagine close-knit communities guided by the serene wisdom of elders.

item.title: When Management Works Against Itself in Software Development
item.description: A common issue in software development is the disconnect between management priorities and the engineering practices required for long-term success.
